about_the_game:
Enter the kingdom of Riki. A magical place filled with mysteries, secrets, and most of all magic. Through generations, mages have come to Riki to study the Sage, the essence of existence. Through this study, research, and experimentation great and terrible magics have risen and fallen. Riki enjoys a prosperous existence where all are free.

Riki was once a peaceful kingdom, until now. Demons now threaten the safety and prosperity of the kingdom, perhaps even the entire world. You and your friends are now all that stand in their way to domination. Will you prevail and lead your people to victory, or will you fail and plunge your kingdom to the depths of darkness.




  • Sacrificial Combat: Casting spells lowers your own stats. Each battle is a complex optimization problem.
  • Turn Based Combat: Manage the speed stat and spell cast time to out maneuver your foes. Will you play with quick spells or use a hard hitting slow strategy.
  • Equipment Management: Maxing out levels with equipment grants permanent buffs. Carefully select what equipment you use to maximize your power.
  • Dynamic Inventory: Consumable items will improve and spoil over time. This is not a game for potion hoarders.




  • Dynamic Environment: Your choices and progression will change the world. Watch the environment around you change.
  • Explore the Kingdom: Riki is a large island Kingdom. You will be able to travel the entire island.
  • Amazing Soundtrack: Enjoy over 2 hours of newly composed music.




  • An Epic Story: Follow the story of a party of mages fighting for the survival of their home.
  • Spell Wagers: When in desperate combat you can change the pace with spell wagers, allowing you to cast stronger spells. This wager comes at a price to your stats and spell cast times, use with caution.
  • Perk System: Use the perk system to make your party fit your play style. Will you have tanks with a healer or go for all out offence. The choice is yours.

  • Memory: 2 GB RAM

  • DirectX: Version 10

short_description: Welcome to the Kingdom of Riki! Viridian Sage is an epic 2D JRPG following a party of young mages fighting against the demons attacking their home. You will explore a vibrant world, engage in strategic combat, and, maybe, save the world. Grab your wand, stock your spells, and prepare for adventure!
